input.sentences: here is the tour de location tryouts .
look at everyone running for the start .
the line is so massive - there 's no way to win when i 'm this far behind .
output.sentences: The day of the big bike race was here, and everyone was at the starting line.
As the whistles sounded off, dozens of bikers began, peddling with all their might.
It was a close call, but as everyone rounded the final lap, it was clear who the winner would be.
Just as everyone predicted, Johnny came in first place!
Everyone celebrated afterwards, but this time in cars rather than bikes.
